header.title: Belgium
header.tagline: Hello! I am Tatiana Lavrenova. Your guide for Belgium
header.description: From the picturesque old town center to the beautiful Arden valleys, I'll show you Belgium like you've never seen it before

about.title: About me
about.tagline: I have been a tour guide for over 5 years.
about.description: I am happy to tell my tourists not only about sights, but also about everyday life, traditions, achievements, customs, habits and laws of this small but very interesting country.

tours.title: Tours
tours.tagline: From East to West and North to South
tours.description: I will guide you to the most interesting and unique places in Belgium

contact.title: Contact me
contact.tagline: If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact me
contact.description: I am available through whatsapp or viber using the links provided links
